title: Config UI: markdown help, priority, param sort, deprecation

body:
fixes https://github.com/evcc-io/evcc/issues/18582
fixes https://github.com/evcc-io/evcc/issues/18385

📖 markdown support for property help
🕷️ show deprecation notice on deprecated props
🔢 vehicles: better property sorting
🚨 aligned loadpoint priority select with vehicle (0-9 dropdown)

☝️ Note: Plain urls in help texts are not auto-linked any more. We should convert them to markdown links with proper label anyways: `[example.org](https://example.org/path-to-the-actual-info)`
